topic: The Farley Ceilings - parameters for TRANS
body:
Jochen Kauschmann wrote:


> Is there someone out there with experience in modelling a 'Farley 
> Ceiling' in a museum environment ?
>  
> If yes, what parameters did you use??


Hi Jochen,


This is a new one on me, I have to admit.  Thanks for sharing this.  I 
managed to find a website for this product 
(http://www.thefarleyceiling.com/default.asp), but it is a bit thin on 
info.  From what I can tell, this is just a fabric panel.  Is this 
correct, or is part of the system the skylight well above the panel? 
Either way, judging from the photos on the website, is seems like a 
simple job for plastic & trans (and illum sources!), to model this in 
Radiance.


Can you share more info about this ceiling system?






      Rob Guglielmetti
